column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Wonderful collection. The miniature gallery is adorable. They have quite a big collection of John Singer Sargent's work. Hopper's Nighthawk is not on display
column2: and the security lady told me that it's almost always gone somewhere else.. but they have so much more to see anyway. The Museum shop is amazing
column3: I would say that it's even better than the one in National Gallery of Art in Washington DC!
